create_form.description: Create a form based on an existing template form.

props.name: form_name
props.description: The name of the new form (must be unique).

props.name: template_form_id
props.description: Select the template form to copy from.

props.name: enabled
props.description: Whether the created form should be enabled. If not set, inherits from template.

props.name: steps
props.description: Define the steps for your form.

props.name: step_id
props.description: Unique ID for this step.

props.name: template_step_id
props.description: ID of the step to copy from the template. Leave empty to auto-create.

props.name: origin
props.description: Set to true if this is the first step of the form.

props.name: step_images
props.description: Edit image elements on steps.

props.name: step_id
props.description: The step containing this image.

props.name: id
props.description: ID of the image element to edit.

props.name: source_url
props.description: New image URL.

props.name: asset
props.description: Name of the image asset from the template theme.

props.name: step_videos
props.description: Edit video elements on steps.

props.name: step_id
props.description: The step containing this video.

props.name: id
props.description: ID of the video element to edit.

props.name: source_url
props.description: New video URL.

props.name: asset
props.description: Name of the video asset from the template theme.

props.name: step_texts
props.description: Edit text elements on steps.

props.name: step_id
props.description: The step containing this text element.

props.name: id
props.description: ID of the text element to edit.

props.name: text
props.description: New text to display.

props.name: asset
props.description: Name of the text asset from the template theme.

props.name: step_buttons
props.description: Edit button elements on steps.

props.name: step_id
props.description: The step containing this button.

props.name: id
props.description: ID of the button to edit.

props.name: text
props.description: Text to display on the button.

props.name: asset
props.description: Name of the button asset from the template theme.

props.name: step_progress_bars
props.description: Edit progress bar elements on steps.

props.name: step_id
props.description: The step containing this progress bar.

props.name: id
props.description: ID of the progress bar to edit.

props.name: progress
props.description: Progress percentage (0-100).

props.name: asset
props.description: Name of the progress bar asset from the template theme.

props.name: step_fields
props.description: Edit field elements on steps.

props.name: step_id
props.description: The step containing this field.

props.name: id
props.description: ID of the field to copy.

props.name: field_id
props.description: ID to set for the field. Links to existing field data if ID exists.

props.name: type
props.description: Type of the field.

props.name: description
props.description: Label/description of the field.

props.name: required
props.description: Whether the field is required.

props.name: placeholder
props.description: Placeholder text for the field.

props.name: tooltipText
props.description: Tooltip text for the field.

props.name: max_length
props.description: Maximum length of the field value.

props.name: min_length
props.description: Minimum length of the field value.

props.name: submit_trigger
props.description: Does filling out this field trigger step submission?

props.name: asset
props.description: Name of the field asset from the template theme.

props.name: navigation_rules
props.description: Define how users navigate between steps.

props.name: previous_step_id
props.description: The step the user is coming from.

props.name: next_step_id
props.description: The step the user is going to.

props.name: trigger
props.description: How navigation is triggered.

props.name: element_type
props.description: Type of element that triggers navigation.

props.name: element_id
props.description: ID of the element that triggers navigation.

props.name: navigation_conditions
props.description: Conditions for navigation rules. Reference the navigation rule by its index (0-based).

props.name: rule_index
props.description: Index of the navigation rule (0 for first rule, 1 for second, etc.).

props.name: comparison
props.description: Type of comparison.

props.name: field_key
props.description: ID of the field to compare.

props.name: value
props.description: Value to compare against.

props.name: logic_rules
props.description: Advanced logic rules for the form.

props.name: name
props.description: Name of the logic rule.

props.name: code
props.description: JavaScript code to run.

props.name: trigger_event
props.description: Event that triggers the rule.

props.name: description
props.description: Description of the logic rule.

props.name: index
props.description: Order in which this rule executes.

props.name: steps_csv
props.description: Step IDs that trigger the rule (for submit/load events). Separate with commas.

props.name: elements_csv
props.description: Element IDs that trigger the rule (for change/error/view/action events). Separate with commas.

props.name: form_id
props.description: Select the form to delete.

props.name: confirm_delete
props.description: Check to confirm deletion. This action cannot be undone.

export_submission_pdf.description: Create a PDF export for a specific form submission.

props.name: form_id
props.description: Select the form to export submission from.

props.name: user_id
props.description: Select the user whose submission to export.

list_form_submissions.description: List submission data for a particular form.

props.name: form_id
props.description: Select the form to get submissions for.

props.name: start_time
props.description: Limit submissions to after this update time.

props.name: end_time
props.description: Limit submissions to before this update time.

props.name: created_after
props.description: Limit submissions to after this creation time.

props.name: created_before
props.description: Limit submissions to before this creation time.

props.name: count
props.description: Limit the number of returned submissions.

props.name: completed
props.description: Filter by completion status.

props.name: fields
props.description: Comma-separated list of field IDs to return.

props.name: no_field_values
props.description: Don\

props.name: sort
props.description: How to sort the returned field values.

props.name: page_size
props.description: Number of results per page (default 500, max 1000).

props.name: use_cache
props.description: Use cached data for faster response (may be a few minutes old).

props.name: field_search
props.description: Search for submissions with specific field values.

props.name: field_id
props.description: The field ID to search.

props.name: value
props.description: The value to match.

props.name: fuzzy_search_threshold
props.description: Score threshold between 0 and 1 for fuzzy search.

props.name: fuzzy_search_parameters
props.description: Fields and terms for fuzzy search. Weights must sum to 1.

props.name: field_id
props.description: The field to compare.

props.name: term
props.description: The term to search for.

props.name: weight
props.description: Importance of this field (0-1). All weights must sum to 1.

props.name: form_id
props.description: Select the form to update.

props.name: form_name
props.description: New name for the form.

props.name: enabled
props.description: Whether the form should be enabled or disabled.

props.name: translations
props.description: Add translations for form text. Note: This will override existing translations.

props.name: default_text
props.description: The original text to translate.

props.name: language_code
props.description: Language code (e.g., "es" for Spanish, "fr" for French).

props.name: translation
props.description: The translated text.

file_submitted.description: Triggers when a file is submitted in your form, or when a document is signed/generated.

props.name: lookup_type
props.description: Choose how to find document envelopes.

props.name: document_id
props.description: The ID of the document template to monitor.

props.name: user_id
props.description: Select the user to monitor for file submissions.

form_completed.description: Triggers when a form is completed by an end user.

props.name: form_id
props.description: Select the form to monitor for completions.

new_submission.description: Triggers when a user submits data through your form.

props.name: form_id
props.description: Select the form to monitor for submissions.
